about_the_game:
RPG Maker official material collection is now available.

This is a picture material of old Japanese school buildings.
Time difference and horror scene difference materials are also included.
Please use these materials for horror game development.

You can expand the world design with the Minikle's Background CG Material Collection Abandoned School Horror part01 A"

*******************************************
Including pictures：70 material x 2 sizes（816 pixels×624 pixels、1280 pixels x 720 pixels）
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
